# cloudferro Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# vim: set softtabstop=2 shiftwidth=2 expandtab :

provider "cloudferro" {
  host        = "host"
  token       = "api token"
  server_cert = "path to the cert bundle"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)

### Optional

- `server_cert` (String)
